original_title: Gran Casal, me como el mundo
overview: Tino Casal was a singer and artist, but also a producer, leather craftsman and friend of his friends. This documentary dives, through numerous characters, into the figure of the Spanish pop singer of the 80s, who died in a traffic accident at the age of 41. His innovative artistic facet, psychedelia, his struggle, success, decadence... Finally, secrets that have been kept under lock and key until now are revealed and that have broken the schemes of those who thought they knew the great divo.
title: Gran Casal, me como el mundo
